conbody.p: Consultation with DPC is required prior to the use of a firm-fixed-price (FFP) contract for a sole source acquisition with a value greater than $500 million for U.S. or combined U.S./FMS requirements for a major system as defined in FAR 2.101. This consultation should use the Peer Review process provided at NMCARS 5201.170. The HCA shall notify DASN(P) by email at https://psctool.us with the subject â€œ[Activity Name] Consultation with DPC for a FFP Contract over $500M" seven days prior to requesting the review from DPC.
